#include <stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#define pn() printf("\n")
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(long long &x)
{
register long long c = gc();
x = 0;
long long neg = 0;
for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
if(neg) x=-x;
}
#define pc putchar_unlocked
void printlong(long long n)
{
char op[41];
int size = 40;
while(n)
{
op[size--] = n%10+'0';
n/=10;
}
for(int i=size+1;i<41;i++)
pc(op[i]);
pc('\n');
}
 
int main()
{
int t=0;
long long n,k,m;
 
scanf("%d",&t);
 
while(t--)
{
scanint(n);
scanint(k);
scanint(m);
if(k == 1)
printlong(n);
else
{
while((n%k==0) && m)
{
n /= k;
m--;
}
if(m % 2 != 0)
n *= k;
printlong(n);
}
}
return 0;
}
